item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossy)】iTunes Plus - Amy Winehouse - Back to Black [iTunes Plus M4A AAC]
item.description:
N O T E S
· First things first, Tears Dry On Their Own & Wake Up Alone have been replaced with their Lioness: Hidden Treasures counterpart on Disc One. I HATE the Uptempo versions (more so Tears Dry on Their Own) released for the album but those are put in the second disc if you still want them. I feel the Lioness versions fit WAY more for the album and were an obvious choice to be more uptempo for the album to create a hit.
· I did not include the You Know I'm No Good remix with Ghostface Killa as I don't think he fits it at all either, but if you need it, I have placed it in the folder as a separate single. You'll need to adjust it to the album accordingly.
· Closer to the Front is a Japanese bonus for the standard edition of Back to Black and was not on iTunes, so that's Apple Lossless.
If you have an iTunes Plus version, please let me know. I'll post it and give you credit.
· These all are mainly from the Back to Black deluxe release, except Closer to the Front & Back To Black (The Rumble Strips Remix) which are on the Japanese edition. Only the Back to Black remix was released to iTunes sadly though.

D I S CㅤO N E
01. Rehab
02. You Know I'm No Good
03. Me & Mr. Jones
04. Just Friends
05. Back to Black
06. Love Is a Losing Game
07. Tears Dry On Their Own
08. Wake Up Alone
09. Some Unholy War
10. He Can Only Hold Her

D I S C ㅤT W O
01. Addicted
02. Valerie
03. Cupid
04. Monkey Man
05. You're Wondering Now
06. Close to the Front
07. Hey Little Rich Girl featuring Zalon & Ade
08. Love Is a Losing Game (Original Demo)
09. Tears Dry On Their Own (Uptempo)
10. Wake Up Alone (Uptempo)
11. Some Unholy War (Downtempo)
12. To Know Him Is to Love Him (Live)
13. Rehab (Hot Chip Remix)
14. Back To Black (The Rumble Strips Remix)
